question: And do you like your job?

And I can use my, English ability and I enjoy meeting new people. also, I just enjoy using English itself. And plus I also enjoy speaking and writing English. So I am currently enjoying my job.

question: And what were your favorite hobbies when you were a child?

question: So yeah, could you describe a person who you regularly follow on social media?
transcript: I follow, Hung Min Son, who is a famous Korean footballer on social media. As he, as I said before, he is a football player, professional football player. he is not only famous in Korea, he is pretty famous worldwide. He plays for such a popular team, Tottenham Hotspur, the most famous player. The most popular league, Premier League. Of course, well, he is very famous and actually, I have liked him for a long time actually. since he played for Hamburg in Germany. He used to play for Bundesliga. he started his career there. well, he usually, I think he usually post his moments of playing football in his league. like not only his league, Champions League or FA League. I follow him on social media because of course I like him as a footballer. I like his play and I like his attitude. But not only that, I also like him as a person. I like his character.

question: So, do you think it is easy to make friends on social media?
transcript: Actually I do not think so, because social media is an online platform. in my opinion, without offline meeting, I think it is really extremely difficult to become friends. So, of course, you can easily chat with new people and probably you can approach others very easily because, you can, basically send a message directly to people. Through the function But I don think it easy because in order to become friends you need to meet You need to have an offline meeting So I think it really difficult to make friends through or by social media And why is it necessary to meet people face to face to become friends because without meeting face to face, I think I would feel very awkward, just chatting online. I do not feel like I am talking to my friends. I am just, because, if I just talk to the person, Like online, I think it is kind of meaningless to me. I do not feel like I am talking to the person.

anti_overrating.reason: 'without offline meeting' (without an offline meeting / meeting offline). 'I don think it easy' (it is easy).

question: And do you think in the future people will still read newspapers and paper books?
transcript: No, I do not think so. I think everything will be turned into e-books.
